member.name: T:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicDataManagerDesigner
member.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicDataManagerDesigner.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicDataManagerDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml
member.summary: Generates the HTML markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
member.returns: The HTML markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

member.name: T:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner
member.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the object.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.CreateField(System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema)
member.summary: Creates a new object by using the specified data field information.
member.param: Schema information that contains the structure of the data field.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.CreateTemplateField(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl)
member.summary: Creates a field for the specified data field.
member.param: The data-bound control that contains the data field object.

member.name: P:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.DefaultNodeText
member.summary: Gets the default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
member.returns: The default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.GetNodeText(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField)
member.summary: Gets the name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
member.returns: The name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.GetTemplateContent(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode)
member.summary: Gets the content of the template field.
member.returns: The content of the template field.
member.param: The display mode for the specified data field.

member.name: M:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.IsEnabled(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl)
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the data field is enabled in the fields editor.
member.returns: true if the data field is enabled in the fields editor; false if the data field will not be displayed in the fields editor.
member.param: The data-bound control whose data control fields are being edited.

member.name: P:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.UsesSchema
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether schema information is used to load the data fields.
